body:
https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/edit/JamesWTruher/TestStatus/docs/testing-guidelines/testing-guidelines.md

The last sentence in the first section says:

For creating new tests, please review the documents on how to create tests for PowerShell.

However, it links to the "testing-guidelines" folder than a specific doc which is not useful.  Is it supposed to link to "Writing Pester Tests" or something else?  Seems like we're missing a how-to on authoring and submitting new tests?
title: testing-guidelines.md incorrect link to write new tests?
